testcase.name: testStep3_exactlyOneVisaIsIssued
testcase.system-out: Running step 3 ==== DROOLS SESSION START ==== ==> AgendaGroup 'issue-visa' pushed to stack ==> AgendaGroup 'valid-application' pushed to stack ==> AgendaGroup 'invalid-application' pushed to stack ==> AgendaGroup 'valid-passport' pushed to stack ==> AgendaGroup 'invalid-passport' pushed to stack Passport[no:CA-SARAH-1, name:Sarah Murphy] is INVALID because it is expired Passport[no:CA-SIMON-2, name:Simon Murphy] is INVALID because it has no space for visa ==> AgendaGroup 'invalid-passport' popped from stack Passport[no:AU-EMILY-3, name:Emily Brown] is without validation info, consider OK for now Passport[no:AU-JAMES-4, name:James Brown] is without validation info, consider OK for now ==> AgendaGroup 'valid-passport' popped from stack Set VisaApplication(#1, pass:CA-SARAH-1) invalid as Passport[no:CA-SARAH-1, name:Sarah Murphy] hasn't passed validation Set VisaApplication(#2, pass:CA-SIMON-2) invalid as Passport[no:CA-SIMON-2, name:Simon Murphy] hasn't passed validation Set VisaApplication(#4, pass:AU-JAMES-4) invalid as Passport[no:AU-JAMES-4, name:James Brown] not valid 6 months after visit ==> AgendaGroup 'invalid-application' popped from stack VisaApplication(#3, pass:AU-EMILY-3) is without validation info, consider OK for now ==> AgendaGroup 'valid-application' popped from stack Issue Visa[passport:AU-EMILY-3] ==> AgendaGroup 'issue-visa' popped from stack ==== DROOLS SESSION END ==== == Visas from session == Visa[passport:AU-EMILY-3]
